title: Wavemother's Sickle
content:
a pitiless crescent moon over turbulent seas.

Sickle Location & Where to Find

Location: Lower City Quest: Avenge the Drowned Dropped by: Allandra Grey

Sickle Notes & Tips

Rarity: Common Value: 190 Weight: 0.9
